Summary: saw 2 glowing orbs, then another appeared, then 2 more totalling 5
divs: sighting detailsmy son was in the living room and glanced out the front window "ma, come quick-ya gotta see this." so i go to the living room and we went out to the front porch. we saw 2 glowing orbs just hanging above the treeline. they were moving slowly-then another one appeared and then 2 more. they were all reddish orange in color. i told him i've been waiting to see a ufo my whole life (i've always believed). we both thought it was pretty cool, not scarey or anything. anyway, after about 12 or 15 mins. of observing them they just sort of blinked out. there was no noise or perhaps they were just too far away. we knew these weren't planes form the get go. well, that concludes my first ufo experience as of 8\10\13. by the way happy meteor showers!
